title: Sonoma
name: Town Square
content: The only bar in Sonoma open for business on Christmas. Yup, Town Square is that kind of place. A tiny dive bar located opposite the ''other'' dive bar (Steiner's) - you're either a fan of this bar or the other. Cheap booze, heavy pours, local flavor and a laid back tiny bar vibe. It's 5 o'clock somewhere.
